clip.quote: Get comfortable being uncomfortable. Business is hard, being a REALTOR is hard.
clip.why_clipworthy: It encourages REALTORS to embrace challenges as growth opportunities.
clip.suggested_hook: Are you ready to step out of your comfort zone and thrive in real estate?
